sourcesContent:
{{reservationForm}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodtruckService } from '../services/foodtruck/foodtruck.service'; import { tap } from 'rxjs/operators'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-accueil', templateUrl: './accueil.component.html', styleUrls: ['./accueil.component.css'] }) export class AccueilComponent implements OnInit { foodtrucks: any = []; selectedFoodtruck:any=null; isDateValid: boolean = true; reservationDate:any=null; reservationForm:boolean=false; constructor(private foodtruckService: FoodtruckService,private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.loadFoodtrucks(); } loadFoodtrucks(): void { this.foodtruckService.getAllFoodtrucks().subscribe({ next: (foodtrucks) => { // Traitement en cas de succès this.foodtrucks = foodtrucks; }, error: (error) => { // Traitement en cas d'erreur console.error('Error loading foodtrucks:', error); }, }); } checkDate(value: string): void { const selectedDate = new Date(value); const today = new Date(); this.isDateValid = selectedDate > today; } submitForm(): void { if (!this.isDateValid) { alert('Veuillez sélectionner une date dans le futur.'); return; } } }
